executable.title: Fiducial Registration (BRAINS)
executable.description: Computes a rigid, similarity or affine transform from a matched list of fiducials
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the National Alliance for Medical Image Computing (NAMIC), funded by the National Institutes of Health through the NIH Roadmap for Medical Research, Grant U54 EB005149.

point.name: fixedLandmarks
point.description: Ordered list of landmarks in the fixed image
point.label: Fixed landmarks

point.name: movingLandmarks
point.description: Ordered list of landmarks in the moving image
point.label: Moving landmarks

transform.name: saveTransform
transform.label: Save transform
transform.description: Save the transform that results from registration

file.name: fixedLandmarksFile
file.description: An fcsv formatted file with a list of landmark points.
file.label: Fixed FCSV file

file.name: movingLandmarksFile
file.description: An fcsv formatted file with a list of landmark points.
file.label: Moving FCSV file

integer.name: numberOfThreads
integer.label: Number Of Threads
integer.description: Explicitly specify the maximum number of threads to use.
